original_text: The Jewish leaders were very surprised. They asked, ‘How does this man know so much? He has not learned in our schools.’
korean_text: 유대인들이 놀랍게 여겨 이르되 이 사람은 배우지 아니하였거늘 어떻게 글을 아느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders were very surprised.
'How does this man know so much?'
He has not learned in our schools.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 학교에서 배운 적이 없다.'
